医学新闻来自News -Medical.net-世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-gb
增加了与气候模式变化有关的过敏症状喉镜上发表的一项综述表明，气候变化对花粉季节和浓度的影响有助于提高过敏性鼻炎或花粉症的发生率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/increased-allergy-symptoms-tied-to-changing-changing-climate-patterns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/increased-allergy-symptoms-tied-to-changing-changing-climate-patterns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=51CA72A2-7CF7-494E-97AD-939416586D6B Wed, 09 Apr 2025 11:44:36 -0400 Increased allergy symptoms tied to changing climate patterns
鱼游泳膀胱水凝胶显示出心脏修复的希望由交联聚合物形成的软材料的水凝胶可能具有多种医疗应用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/fish-swim-bladder-hydrogel-hydrogel-shows-promise-inhert-repair.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/fish-swim-bladder-hydrogel-hydrogel-shows-promise-in-romise-in-hern-hert-repair.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1CDC679B-B510-42F3-8061-E8227B944383 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 11:40:13 -0400 Fish swim bladder hydrogel shows promise in heart repair
合格的助产士护理减少了分娩期间的医疗干预措施格拉纳达大学（UGR）研究人员与安达卢西亚助产士协会合作进行的一项研究确定，这些合格的专业人员提供的医疗保健对健康和国际医疗保健系统的运作产生了积极影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/qualified-midwifery-care-reduces-medical-interventions-interventions-during-childbirth.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/qualified-midwifery-care-reduces-medical-indical-interventions-during-during-childbirth.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0E9AFD84-7C8E-4605-9535-BB609B03D3DE Wed, 09 Apr 2025 10:46:48 -0400 Qualified midwifery care reduces medical interventions during childbirth
基于激光的红外分子指纹识别常见癌症传统上，癌症诊断需要侵入性或劳动密集型程序，例如组织活检。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/laser-lase-lase-infrared-molecular-molecular-molecular-fingerprinting-detects-common-cancers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/laser-laser-lase-infrared-molecular-molecular-molecular-fingerprinting-detects-common-cancers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=08DC4E6666-B51D-4B12-A249-A249-99BC53142C9D Wed, 09 Apr 2025 10:40:11 -0400 Laser-based infrared molecular fingerprinting detects common cancers
使用Semacyte®技术推进粘附的细胞测定Semarion的Semacyte®技术会改变粘附的细胞分析，从而更快，自动化的工作流，从而提高药物发现中的可扩展性和效率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/advancing-adherent-cell-assays-with-semacytec2ae-technology.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/advancing-adherent-cell-assays-with-semacytec2ae-technology.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=88F79474-3A6F-4E78-ACA2-385487F57 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 10:37:00 -0400 Advancing Adherent Cell Assays with SemaCyte® Technology
动态BH3分析提供个性化的肺癌疗法被诊断出的肺癌病例中有85％是非小细胞肺癌（NSCLC）。在这一组中，有5％的患者显示出与细胞繁殖有关的碱基因的分子改变。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/dynamic-bh3-profilingers-offers-personalized-lung-cancer-therapies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/dynamic-bh3-profilingers-offers-personalized-lung-cancer-therapies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fac2bff4-7D25-4194-B450-F99B7A297794 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 10:24:00 -0400 Dynamic BH3 profiling offers personalized lung cancer therapies
研究揭示了骨骼再生的性别差异在组织工程中，骨骼再生仍然是一个关键的挑战，无法预测的结果通常阻碍临床应用。当前的策略忽略了供体差异和生物性别等关键因素，这两者在骨折愈合中起着重要作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-sex-differences-in-bone-regeneration.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/study-reveals-sex-differences-in-bone-regeneration.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87d0cebe-3BCA-4358-B442-CFDEA5871271 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 09:09:48 -0400 Study reveals sex differences in bone regeneration
口腔健康是女性疼痛障碍的关键因素悉尼大学的新研究表明，口腔健康状况不佳与女性偏头痛，腹部和身体疼痛的较高实例显着相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/Oral-Health-ehthy-emerges-aas-key-factor-in-womens-womens-pain-pain-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/oral-health-ehthy-emerges-aas-key-factor-in-womens-womens-pain-pain-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=10A004A7-A4E6-46B4-AF38-589816BA03FC Wed, 09 Apr 2025 09:06:06 -0400 Oral health emerges as key factor in women's pain disorders
细胞细胞分析揭示了图雷特综合征的大脑变化在第一个全面的细胞细胞分析中，来自Tourette综合征的个体的脑组织，研究人员准确地指出了哪些细胞受到干扰以及它们的故障，揭示了如何受到疾病影响不同类型的脑细胞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cell-cell-cell-analysis-reveals-reveals-brain-changes-in-tourette-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/cell-cell-cell-cell-analysis-reveals-reveals-brain-changes-in-tourette-in-tourette-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=16b5514e-e7d1-409d-82ff-d82ff-d8f9de64bca2 Wed, 09 Apr 2025 08:56:50 -0400 Cell-by-cell analysis reveals brain changes in Tourette syndrome
神经器官提供了有关痴呆机制的洞察力俄亥俄州立大学韦克斯纳医学中心和医学院的研究人员发现了一种新的方法，即通过使用人类神经类器官（也称为“迷你脑”模型），来自额叶叶退化（FTLD）的患者，通过使用人类神经器官（也称为“迷你脑”模型）在神经变性中作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/neural-organoids-offer-insight-insto-into-mechanisms-of-dementia.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250409/neural-organoids-offer-insight-insight-into-into-mechanisms-of-dementia.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bacedad6-f200-4302-a4bd-9aff76d2e06e Wed, 09 Apr 2025 08:24:24 -0400 Neural organoids offer insight into mechanisms of dementia
